name: Peeing pants and other clothes. (Illustrated styles only)
description:
This is my wetting LORA trained on 100 images from Gelbooru. It focuses on wetting and can do dark stains. There are no activation words. This works with different models that output drawn images but I found AbyssOrangeMix3 (AOM3) and RevAnimated works really good. It does not work at all with photos as no real images were included in the training data.

For Version 1.0 use "Peeing self" to make sure the image include the character peeing themselves.

For Version 2.0 use "pee stain" instead of "peeing self" if you want to ensure you get dark stains. Add more attention to "pee stain" for bigger pee stains. Add "pee" to the negative prompt if you want to reduce the copious amounts of pee that usually appear without removing the pee stain.

After some more testing I've found between 1 and 1.5 for the LORA weight will generate pee stains on clothing that previously wouldn't have pee stains, and makes the pee stains larger and more well defined. Be aware that changing the weight too much will completely change the image even if you use the same seed.

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description:
• Added "pee stain" to the captions in the dataset which now allows the model to make better pee stains. Also fixed some minor incorrect captions.

  • Discovered how much of a pain it is to edit text files using Google Drive.

It seems like it was only yesterday I released my first pants wetting LORA...oh it was! If you've used it you probably noticed it's not that great at making pee stains. It can do it, but it just doesn't give that massive wet spot us weird fetishists demand. This update now makes large pee stains on most types of clothing. Oddly jeans still exhibit the same behavior as my first version with relatively small pee stains. I can only assume I don't have enough jeans with pee stains in my dataset.

To use this version use "pee stain" to get a wetting with a pee stain. Add more attention to "pee stain" to make the pee stain larger. If you don't like the massive gushers this model sometimes produces add "pee" to the negative prompt to reduce the amount of pee while still maintaining the pee stain. If you want a wetting with a small pee stain use "peeing self". If you use "peeing self" adding "pee" to negative prompts will result in no wetting at all.

Changing the weight on the LORA will change the size of the pee stain and how much pee there is in general. Normally I use 0.7 weight, but for this LORA 1 weight is working out for me. Don't be afraid to play with the weights though.

Just like the previous version I've found that https://civitai.com/models/9942/abyssorangemix3-aom3 works really well with my LORA. Other animated models do work to some degree however.
